  - Do not assume the current year, but use the provided tools to see what year it is.

Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

I have found two events with the query "Dental check-up". However, only one of them seems to be a dentist appointment. I will assume that the event with the title "Dentist Appointment" and the ID '5' is the correct one.

To reschedule this event, I will use the `reschedule_calendar_event` function. Since the event duration is 1 hour (from 09:00 to 10:00), I will keep the same duration and set the new end time to 2024-05-20 11:00.

```
<function=reschedule_calendar_event>{"event_id": "5", "new_start_time": "2024-05-20 10:00:00", "new_end_time": "2024-05-20 11:00:00"}</function>
```
